attributes.action: ban the sale of primates as pets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think it is outrageous that it is still legal to keep primates as pets and that the government plans to down grade certain primates from the dangerous wild animals list. these animals cannot have a happy and fulfilled life in a home environment and many are torn from their mothers in the wild, we must make the sale of all primates for the pet trade  in the uk illegal.
